body.name: 8 Pack Beach Towel Clips for Beach Chairs Cruise, Beach Chair Clips for Towels Lounge Chairs Pool Towel Holder, Large Clips Plastic Clothespins Clamps for Hanging Clothes in Bright Color(White,Green)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 10 hrs 10 mins
features: [Sturdy&Durable]: The towel clips for chairs are made of thick PP material, not easy to break even after being used for a long time. The double-layer clamps are more durable than other single layer plastic towel clips. The spring is made of stainless steel, which is strong and would not rust even when used in a humid environment. Especially suitable for hanging beach towels and pool towels. The great cruise essentials for women, cruise accessories must haves, beach accessories, vacation essentials, pool accessories.

[Large Size&Bright Color]: With length 4 inch and opening up to 2.3 inch, the beach chair towel clips are not only suitable for most beach chairs, lounge chairs, pool chairs, deck chairs and lawn chairs. but also fit most hanging rods on cruise, boat, pool and home. The bright color is perfect for a wonderful summer and also can help you to find your beach chairs easily.

[Waterproof&Windproof]: The PP material body and strong stainless steel spring make the beach towel chair clips not easy to rust and windproof. The chair clips for beach towels can be used in windy and rainy days outdoor, especially suitable for beach and cruise use. No need to worry about getting rusted after a long time use.

[Lightweight&Portable]: The weight of our pool towel holder clips is only 26g, makes our beach towel clips for cruise very lightweight. You can easy to put these pool towel clips in your beach bag or backpack, and carry them out for travel, or go to beach, pool or cruise.

[Safe for Your Towels]: Unlike normal single-layer plastic or stainless steel towel clips, our clamps feature a unique inner gasket, it makes our large beach towel clips to have smooth edges and no sharp corners, prevent your towels and clothes from being scratched, and would not leave any marks on your clothes.

[Multi-function]: Our beach clips can not only help secure your beach towels tightly on your chairs, prevent your beach towels from being blown off by the wind, or falling off onto the sand, but also can be used as chip clips, snack clips, photo clips, fabric clips, pool cover clips, quilt clips, laundry clips for hanging towels, socks, clothes, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sylroal beach clips for towels and chairs, the great choice for cruise must haves, beach essentials for vacation, beach accessories for women, etc.

Product Features Inner Gasket Our cruise towel clips feature a inner gasket on the clamps. That makes the clamps non-slip and no damages to your clothes. No need to worry about the clothespins scratch your clothes with sharp edges. Stainless Steel Spring The spring is made of stainless steel and would not get rusted after being used in a wet environment, especially great for beach, pool, cruise, yard, laundry room use. Wide Opening The pool towel clips have a wide opening up to 2.3 inch, not only suitable for most beach chairs, lounge chairs, pool chairs, deck chairs and lawn chairs, but also suitable for most clothes hanging rods, clotheslines and hangers. Thick PP Material Our chair clips for beach towels cruise are mainly made with high-quality thick PP material, more sturdy and durable than other thin plastic clips. You don't need to worry the towel clips cruise is flimsy and easy to break while you're on vacation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and functional
reviews.reviewText: Work great holding my towel to our lounge chairs. Very sturdy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We use these on our beach chairs, mainly when we cruise. put them on the chairs to hold our wet stuff, can be used in the shower on the clothes line to hold wet stuff also,,, seem to be pretty strong,.. have held up on over 6 cruises... a must have

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Funny story. My husband thought he was doing something extremely important and useful by buying these clips for our past cruise. He didn't realize I had had towel clips for about 6 years from our past annual grandmother/mother/daughter beach vacays. I mean, in all fairness, why would he? However, when I mentioned I had towel clips BEFORE he purchased these because he didn't beliveve the ones we had would actually secure our towels, I can't explain. Regardless, he packed these wonderful clips and guess what? They held our towels in place perfectly! In a pinch, they can also be used as chip clips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have not used these towel clips yet, but they seem very durable and do not seem like they would break easily. Liked the colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wish I bought these years ago!
reviews.reviewText: These are fantastic for the pool chairs, especially when it's windy. Holds the towel flat! Love them!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for.
reviews.reviewText: Purchased these clips to hold my above ground pool cover on. It can get super windy where I live and the string around the cover is mostly useless. I did put some cut up towel between the cover and the clip because I was afraid they might cut into the cover. So far they have worked great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Keeps my towel in place at the pool. Esprín windy days.
